urls.title: Delta flight attendant tells wheelchair passenger that TSA will make...
urls.description: "Believe me, I definitely wanted to get off the plane."

data.text:
I am sad to see @delta staff talk to him and saying 'with their guns'. She needs to be removed from her position. Yes they want to clean the plane but seriously.  I'm glad to see #Delta is investigating and has apologized but still no good. We like Delta
https://t.co/EQjwjAeAlJ

urls.title: Delta flight attendant threatens disabled travel blogger with ‘TSA guns’
urls.description: ‘I don’t know why they were so adamant about not bringing it today, but to threaten us with guns?!’

data.text: Dissapointing! @Delta flight attendant threatens #disabled travel blogger with ‘TSA guns’ https://t.co/R3npLhacF8

data.text:
@AlaskaAir 
Is there a way to make a change without being screwed around for 3 hours. Take some lessons from @Delta on how to run an airline.

data.text: @Delta and now the are sitting on the tarmac at MSP because there isn’t a ground crew to bring them into the gate. This is worse than Frontier, Spirit and Sun Country combined. She could have driven to Austin, TX by now. Unbelievable
